sources.title: Trade Statistics
sources.publisher: Department of Commerce, Ministry of Commerce and Industry
sources.notes: Official merchandise and services trade data, DGFT statistics

sources.title: Balance of Payments and Foreign Exchange Reserves
sources.notes: Current account, capital account, forex reserves data

sources.title: Consumer Price Index (CPI) Statistics
sources.publisher: Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MoSPI)
sources.notes: Monthly CPI releases, category-wise inflation, base 2012=100

sources.title: Database on Indian Economy - Prices
sources.notes: Historical inflation data, monetary policy reports

sources.title: National Accounts Statistics
sources.publisher: Ministry of Statistics and Programme Implementation (MoSPI)
sources.notes: GDP estimates, sector-wise GVA, and national income data

sources.title: World Development Indicators - GDP
sources.notes: GDP in current US$, global rankings, and per capita comparisons

sources.title: Union Budget 2024-25
sources.publisher: Ministry of Finance, Government of India
sources.notes: Full budget documents including Budget at a Glance, Expenditure Profile, and Receipt Budget

sources.title: Previous Union Budgets Archive
sources.publisher: Ministry of Finance, Government of India
sources.notes: Historical budget data from Budget at a Glance documents for FY 2015-16 to 2024-25

sources.title: Looking Back at Changes in Fiscal Policy From 2014 to 2024
sources.notes: Analysis of fiscal deficit trends including off-budget borrowing context

sources.title: RBI Monetary Policy Rates History
sources.notes: Chronology of repo rate, CRR, and SLR changes

sources.title: Database on Indian Economy (DBIE)
sources.notes: Official RBI statistical database for monetary policy rates

sources.title: Statistical Tables Relating to Banks in India
sources.notes: Comprehensive banking statistics including deposits, credit, NPAs, and branch network

sources.title: UPI Product Statistics
sources.notes: Monthly UPI transaction data, app-wise statistics

sources.title: Deposit Insurance
sources.publisher: Deposit Insurance and Credit Guarantee Corporation
sources.notes: Deposit insurance coverage, claims data, and member banks

sources.title: Market Statistics and Data
sources.publisher: Securities and Exchange Board of India (SEBI)
sources.notes: FII/DII flows, market cap data, IPO statistics, trading volumes

sources.title: NSE Market Data
sources.notes: Nifty indices, market statistics, trading data

sources.title: BSE Market Statistics
sources.notes: Sensex data, market cap, listed companies

sources.title: Income Tax Statistics and GST Council Data
sources.publisher: Central Board of Direct Taxes & GST Council
sources.notes: Income tax slabs, filing statistics, tax collection data

sources.title: GST Statistics
sources.notes: Monthly GST collection, registration data, return filing
